content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "350 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "175 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Grease and flour two 9 x 5 inch loaf pans.
2) Beat together eggs, sugar, and oil.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Beat"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "eggs"@17:21 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "sugar"@23:28 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "oil"@34:37 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Blend in applesauce, and then sour cream or buttermilk.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Blend in"@3:11 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "applesauce"@12:22 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "sour cream"@33:43 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "buttermilk"@47:57 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Mix in flour, baking powder, soda, and cinnamon.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Mix in"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "flour"@10:15 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "baking powder"@17:30 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "soda"@32:36 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "cinnamon"@42:50 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
